document_name: Law no. 90-AN-15-7th L establishing the legislative framework relating to energy efficiency
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DJI/2015/DJI-2015-01-07-Law no. 90-AN-15-7th L establishing the legislative framework relating to energy efficiency_2df5fddee9f3eeef0b5f641997fa3262.pdf
document_description:
This law establishes a framework legal framework in the field of energy efficiency in the Republic of Djibouti. Energy efficiency is recognized by the State of Djibouti as a national priority insofar as it is part of an approach of national independence and sustainable economic and social development respectful of the environment.

Public and private establishments, whose total primary energy consumption exceeds a threshold set by decree, are subject to the compulsory and periodic energy audit carried out, under the authority of ADME, by an accredited expert auditor. Besides, new energy-consuming projects as well as expansion projects for energy-consuming establishments with a significant energy impact at the national level must be submitted before their completion, to the consultation of the Djiboutian Agency for Energy Management. to improve their energy efficiency.
